website_summaries.verdict: The Sony VAIO Duo 13 is a slick-looking hybrid ultraportable that gives you solid performance and a full workday's worth of battery power. The 13.3?inch touch screen  display delivers a crisp picture with brilliant colors but its viewing angle performance could be better.
cons: No screen adjustment in laptop mode

customer_reviews.title: Nice to Look at but keyboard is somewhat Quirky
customer_reviews.text: I had great delivery from seller. However "Y" key went bad and hard drive CRASHED. Sent back to Sony repair and they replaced hard drive, fan and repaired keyboard. Unfortunately this is the 3rd (TV, 3-laptops )product I've purchased from Sony in past few years and ALL three went bad. I have admired Sony products since I was a child because my Father (deceased) always purchased and loved SONY. I will have to give it very serious considerations before purchasing Sony products going forward because it appears QUALITY has fallen quite a bit!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Hemphill

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Pros: small footprint. connectivity. lightweight. Cons: keyboard. angle of screen. some software - fast access face recognition is bothersome and requires multiple resets. Pen input can be glitchy. Windows 8 to 8.1 upgrade a disaster. caused complete meltdown. the machine not responsible for this, but the mfg software - VAIO Update - should pick all this up before it melts down. Required COMPLETE reinstall of system. Be WARE of Win 8.1!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Maier

customer_reviews.title: Great Computer! cute and fast
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it white, came Black. Excelent comunication with the providers. Computer is awesome! fast and sexy.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice laptop
customer_reviews.text: Very good and fashionable.The only thing I don't like about this laptop is is adjust ability. Can't really work well when you're lying down.
customer_reviews.author: Tuan Le

customer_reviews.title: highly disappointed.very bad product considering the cost
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item and in less than 1year 2 months went blank.I can't even put it on.Am highly disappointed because there is no way I can send it for repairs since no Sony service center in Lagos,Nigeria.
customer_reviews.author: orebanjo abiodun

customer_reviews.title: Some scratches, but good enough
customer_reviews.text: It had some scratches on it, but is in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Hussain Alwael

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting for Sony to come out with a Windows based tablet. It is a great computer. I purchased it for my daughter for college and she says it does everything she needs it to. The touch responsiveness is great and she is loving Windows 8. The Sony also comes with a digitizer pen which was a big part of why we purchased this computer.
customer_reviews.author: leeanna

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice design and lightweight for a laptop. Works great, fast, & responsive touchscreen. The touchpad need improvement or perhaps need some calibration tha I have not had a chance to play with it. Cursor moves unintentionally while typing, maybe too sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Sorouri

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic piece of art!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome piece of device. Never imagine I'll get it, but I still took the plunge n ordered it. No regrets at all.. Fast speed n looks gd..
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Bad, fragile
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality! I bought it, and in less than 1 month, the computer didnt start anymore. Then, I replace for another computer, but the same problem occurred in less than 1 week.
customer_reviews.author: Josana de Moraes Coelho

customer_reviews.title: Nice ultrabook but
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit bigger than I expected (heavier) and not so durable. So it is hard to take with you without a real hard case what I didn't find yet
customer_reviews.author: Zoltan Torok

customer_reviews.title: excelent
customer_reviews.text: EXCELENT PRODUCT BY SONY THIS IS A GREAT PRODUCT RECOMMENDED, THE PRODUCT DESCRIPTION SAYS AS IN THE PUBLICATION OF AMAZON.....
customer_reviews.author: DAN Magallanes M

customer_reviews.title: So Inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: Not very user friendly, a challenge to get use to and operate. Screen doesn't adjust which made it difficult to use and operate. The touch pad stopped operating correctly. The stylus doesn't attach to the pc so it can be easily lost. I do not recommend this product to anyone to purchase, just keep browsing.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: best laptop i ever had but sony will no longer produce them
customer_reviews.text: i love it i love the design the main problem is the webcam is tilted upward, it's light and never felt it's fragile it fell several times and nothing happened, the touch pad has no right and left buttons and it's small but i use a mouse. i ordered the i7 but it never arrived so i asked amazon to cancel the order
customer_reviews.author: rhanya fahmy

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Smooth
customer_reviews.text: The features in this device are what I was looking for. i5 4GB x64 WiDi SD Reader Full size HDMI 2-USB 3 Touch screen (I really like the Stylus) Light weight I would give it a 5 Star, if I could adjust the screen angle. It is a great bother, They offer only 1 position. In my offices, I have to prop it up to get away from the glare from the florescent lighting. I just got a foam calculator wedge to prop it on. The only other issue thus far, I would have preferred the screen is protected when closed.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Stark

product_meta.title: Sony VAIO Duo SVD13213CXB 13.3-Inch Convertible 2 in 1 Touchscreen Ultrabook (1.6 GHz Intel Core i5-4200U Processor, 4GB DDR3, 128GB SSD, Windows 8) Carbon Black
